name: aws-devtools
description: scripts to be used with CDK, GitHub Actions or as in a standalone CLI mode

scripts.build:site:s3: rimraf actions/deploy-s3-site/dist && parcel build ./actions/deploy-s3-site/index.ts --dist-dir actions/deploy-s3-site/dist --no-autoinstall --target default --no-source-maps
scripts.build:site:s3:ncc: rimraf actions/deploy-s3-site/dist && ncc build actions/deploy-s3-site/index.ts -o actions/deploy-s3-site/dist -a --target es2019 -s
scripts.build:serviceimage:ecs:ncc: rimraf actions/update-ecs-server-image/dist && ncc build actions/update-ecs-server-image/index.ts -o actions/update-ecs-server-image/dist -a --target es2019 -s
